## CommunityMessenger.subscribe() method

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
subscribe(topic: string, subscriber: Function): Promise<unknown>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  topic | <code>string</code> | the community topic to subscribe to |
|  subscriber | <code>Function</code> | a callback function which will be called with a protobuf instance of Envelope ( the js protobuf object, not the bytes ) |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<unknown>`
